title: Cut Paper, "Noah's Ark", 1982
creditline: This acquisition was made possible through the Louis Comfort Tiffany Foundation
description: Circular black silhouette paper.  Foliage pattern along bottom, at top of center image are three pairs of couples in windows, and throughout central image are windows with silouettes of a variety of animals.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cut Paper, "Noah's Ark", 1982.
1982. Cut black paper. This acquisition was made possible through the Louis Comfort Tiffany Foundation. 1985-22-1.
